<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk update room available times"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/bulk/available-times"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the weekly availability schedule for multiple rooms in a single operation. Use this to apply consistent hours across many rooms.

**Prerequisites**
1. **Room IDs** - Use [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/query](/docs/api/locations/query-location-rooms) and extract `Items[].LocationRoomId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Collect target room IDs or set `IsSelectAll` with a filter.
2. Build the `Update` array of weekday availability entries.
3. Submit: [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/bulk/available-times](/docs/api/locations/bulk-set-location-room-available-times).

**Minimal Required Fields**: `LocationRoomIds` plus `Update` entries (or `IsSelectAll` with a filter request).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

Based on C# `DataFilterOperations` enum from `Spark.Shared.Enums`.","enum":["None","Equal","Greater","Less","GreaterOrEqual","LessOrEqual","StartsWith","EndsWith","Contains","NotEqual","NotGreater","NotLess","NotGreaterOrEqual","NotLessOrEqual"],"x-enum-descriptions":{"None":"No operation specified","Equal":"Equals (eq)","Greater":"Greater than (gt)","Less":"Less than (lt)","GreaterOrEqual":"Greater than or equal (ge)","LessOrEqual":"Less than or equal (le)","StartsWith":"String starts with","EndsWith":"String ends with","Contains":"String contains","NotEqual":"Not equal (ne)","NotGreater":"Not greater than (ng)","NotLess":"Not less than (nl)","NotGreaterOrEqual":"Not greater than or equal (nge)","NotLessOrEqual":"Not less than or equal (nle)"},"title":"DataFilterOperations"}],"description":"Filter operation to apply"},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Custom field type ID (when filtering on custom fields)"},"ComplexEditorPath":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"JSON path for filtering within complex editor values"},"Items":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":"circular(DataFilter)","description":"Nested filter conditions for complex AND/OR queries"}},"required":["Facet"],"title":"DataFilter"},"description":"Array of filter conditions to apply to the query"},"Collation":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Database collation for string comparisons (locale-specific sorting)"}},"title":"RequestOptions"}],"nullable":true,"type":"object","description":"Pagination and sorting options"}},"title":"GetLocationRoomsRequest"}],"nullable":true,"type":"object","description":"Query filter for selecting rooms (used with IsSelectAll=true)"}},"title":"BulkLocationRoomRequest"}],"properties":{"Update":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request model for creating or updating room availability times.
